title: Why is my internet keep jumping from 42ms to 4000 ms ?? I am from Canada
body: I use to have 32-45ms ... I don't know why is it bad .... and also..... It was snowing but in usually won't jump like that and won't be lag at all.

replies.body: Your isp could certainly be having issues caused by weather, but the most common network problems usually occur more locally.  There could be something going on with your settings or even hardware that's slowing you down, so I suggest running through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune things up.  Hopefully that does the trick!
